column5: Welcome to the Cape! Come experience a taste of Martha's Vineyard in Crystal Beach, TX. This beautiful home has it all! It's decorated and furnished in a classic New England style boasting beadboard ceilings and shiplap walls creating that vintage, eastern seaboard cottage feel; while still including memory foam beds to Wi-Fi, indoor/outdoor stereo, 6 “smart” TVs with DVRs/DVDs and more. This home has fantastic views of the Gulf and majestic sunsets from two amazing decks and inside balcony.
